resources.string: Layne requires location permission to enable the app. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Layne\' > Permissions.
Location permission is required for the use of Layne.
Where do you want to go?
Want to start your ride? \n\t-tap on the map or \n hit Go!

Want to place a marker?
	 -tap and hold, this
 opens up a radial
 menu where you can
 slide your fingers to
 each sub-menu
Want this tutorial again?\n\t -tap the ? in the\n top right!
